getEmptyStatus

public Component getEmptyStatus()
Description copied from interface: ProgressItem
This method should return a component with the same width as getStatusComponent(), which will be used as an empty placeholder to the left of the details component. This method usually won't be called if this component doesn't have a details component.

Specified by:
getEmptyStatus in interface ProgressItem
Returns:
